description: An Etruscan town in the plain of the Po River at modern Marzabotto. It was founded in the early fifth century B.C.

properties.title: OSM location of Area archeologica della antica città etrusca di Pian di Misano - Marzabotto (Kainua)

history.comment: Location updates and tags from Johan Ahlfeldt's (jahlfeldt) Digital Atlas of the Roman Empire in October 2012
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
New locations, coordinates, and metadata from Harvard's DARMC project. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceUpgradesAndMigrations
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade

locations.title: OSM location of Area archeologica della antica città etrusca di Pian di Misano - Marzabotto (Kainua)

history.comment: Etruscan name of settlement; change language to Etruscan, add Govi 2023 reference
